paper_abstract: The present paper reveals the instability in the dimension of the spline space S(d(1), d(2), d(1) - 1, d(2) - 1, T) over certain types of T-meshes T, that is, the dimension is related to not only the topological information of T but also the geometry of T. This insight suggests us to pay much attention to the structure of the T-meshes in modeling with splines over T-meshes. Crown Copyright (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the instability in the dimension of splines spaces over T-meshes
